relation: day of the Week (Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat)
either "GMT" (if set to gmtime), or "Local" (if set to servertime)
textBeforeTable: Supported parameters: Syntax: %ENCODE{"string"}% ENCODE{"string"} -- encodes a string Related: DISPLAYTIME, GMTIME, SERVERTIME Example: %DISPLAYTIME{"$hou:$min"}% expands to 12:05 Syntax: %DISPLAYTIME{"format"}% Formatted time - either GMT or Local server time, depending on setting in TWiki.cfg. Same format qualifiers as %GMTIME% DISPLAYTIME{"format"} -- formatted display time Related: DISPLAYTIME{"format"}, GMTIME, SERVERTIME Expands to: 01 Aug 2015 - 12:05 Syntax: %DISPLAYTIME% DISPLAYTIME -- display time Related: BASETOPIC, INCLUDINGWEB, INCLUDE, WEB Syntax: %BASEWEB% The web name where the includes started, e.g. the web of the first topic of nested includes. Same as %WEB% in case there is no include. BASEWEB -- base web where an INCLUDE started Related: BASEWEB, INCLUDINGTOPIC, INCLUDE, TOPIC Syntax: %BASETOPIC% The name of the topic where a single or nested INCLUDE started - same as %TOPIC% if there is no INCLUDE BASETOPIC -- base topic where an INCLUDE started Related: ATTACHURL, PUBURL,
textAfterTable: Syntax: %GMTIME% Expands to: 01 Aug 2015 - 12:05 Related: DISPLAYTIME, GMTIME{"format"}, SERVERTIME GMTIME{"format"} -- formatted GM time Syntax: %GMTIME{"format"}% Supported variables: Variable: Unit: Example $seconds seconds 59 $minutes minutes 59 $hours hours 23 $day day of month 31 $wday day of the Week (Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat) Thu $month month in ISO format Dec $mo 2 digit month 12 $year 4 digit year 1999 $ye 2 digit year 99 $tz either "GMT" (if set
